CZ Hints at a  $BNB Super Cycle as Regulatory Pressure Eases 

Changpeng Zhao (CZ) recently sparked fresh debate after hinting at a possible crypto super cycle, with many eyes turning toward Binance Coin (BNB). His comments come as the U.S. SEC removes cryptocurrencies from its 2026 priority risk list, a move widely seen as a regulatory cooldown.

BNB has reclaimed the $900 level, and some traders believe sustained momentum could open a path toward the psychological $1,000 mark. Beyond price, BNBâ€™s utility, token burns, and ecosystem activity remain key fundamentals supporting sentiment.

For now, this narrative is sentiment-driven, not confirmed by new developments. Worth watching closely.
